name: Nature Domain
description: Nature domain clerics champion the natural world and its creatures.

1.name: Acolyte of Nature
1.description: Learn one druid cantrip and gain proficiency in Animal Handling, Nature, or Survival.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Charm Animals and Plants
2.description: Use Channel Divinity to charm beasts and plant creatures within 30 feet for 1 minute.

6.name: Dampen Elements
6.description: As a reaction, grant yourself or a creature within 30 feet resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns, deal an extra 1d8 cold, fire, or lightning damage on a weapon attack (2d8 at 14th level).

17.name: Master of Nature
17.description: While creatures are charmed by you, you can use a bonus action to verbally command them on their next turn.

choices.name: Nature Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Nature Domain subclass
